data: I see that you would like a medium marinara pizza. Is there anything else you would like to add to your order, such as drinks?

Alright, I've received your order for one Coke.
The cost for a medium marinera pizza and one Coke is $18.50.
Your order will be ready in 15 minutes. Please visit our shop at 23 Main Street, NY. Your order ID is 8d484b.
